version-status: "v0.2 spec released, parser implementation in progress"

# Agentic Metadata
ps-lang:version: v0.2.0-alpha.1
ps-lang:syntax-features: lazy-close,directional-context,named-zones,chaining
ps-lang:agentic-signature: agentic_ux_v1
ps-lang:data-stream: public-metadata-stream
ps-lang:access-model: public_secrets_key:enabled

# PostScript Journal Metadata
journal-signature: OSS_v1.0.0_public-access
journal-tier: OSS|Plus
encryption-model: self-hosted:user-managed-keys
privacy-token: private-label:user-controlled

# Mission, Vision, Goals
mission: Empower developers with self-hosted AI workflow tracking
vision: Privacy-first AI productivity tools for individuals and teams
goals: 100% data ownership, zero vendor lock-in, open source forever

[zones]
# The 7 PS-LANG zones for context control
agent-blind: <.>
pass-through: <#.>
active-workspace: <@.>
ai-managed: <~.>
sensitive: <$.>
question: <?.>
benchmark: <.bm>

[policies]
/LICENSE
# Privacy-first by default
# export_ok=false for agent-blind and sensitive zones
# Retention policies enforced per zone

[installation]
npx ps-lang@alpha init
# One-time setup, creates .ps-lang/ folder

# Self-hosted AI workflow tracking
# Features: zone parsing, benchmark tracking, ChatGPT & Claude.ai integration
# License: MIT (OSS) | Plus tier available
# Privacy: local-first, user-controlled encryption
# Export: JSON, CSV
# Token model: Clerk-based, private-by-default
# Public access key: user-controlled-settings
